page.title: 18MY STREET
page.content: I live beside the main road which runs through the middle of Stoke Canon. Opposite where I live is Stoke Canon Garage, which is run by George Harrison.Further up the road is the Chapel which is next to the Village Hall. Along the road is the pub, the Stoke Canon Inn. It is just under 100 years old. The land before that was used as a coal yard.The old pub,the late Kings Arms, is now a house. The Post Office, owned by Brian Fordham, is the only shop in the village.Across the road there is the old Vicarage and the new Vicarage.The Vicar,Dr.Avis, lives in the new Vicarage, and next to the old Vicarage is Stoke Canon Primary School.Next to that is the church.There are also some flats, and lots of houses and cottages. I live in a cottage near Stoke Canon Bridge.
